And<S>1161</S> seeing<S>1492</S> the multitudes<S>3793</S>, he went up<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> a mountain<S>3735</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he<S>846</S> was set<S>2523</S>, his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>4334</S> unto him<S>846</S>:
And<S>2532</S> he opened<S>455</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>, and taught<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
Blessed<S>3107</S> are the poor<S>4434</S> in spirit<S>4151</S>: for<S>3754</S> theirs<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are they that mourn<S>3996</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall be comforted<S>3870</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are the meek<S>4239</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall inherit<S>2816</S> the earth<S>1093</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are they which<S>3588</S> do hunger<S>3983</S> and<S>2532</S> thirst<S>1372</S> after righteousness<S>1343</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall be filled<S>5526</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are the merciful<S>1655</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall obtain mercy<S>1653</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are the pure<S>2513</S> in heart<S>2588</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall see<S>3700</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are the peacemakers<S>1518</S>: for<S>3754</S> they<S>846</S> shall be called<S>2564</S> the children<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are they which are persecuted<S>1377</S> for<S>1752</S> righteousness' sake<S>1343</S>: for<S>3754</S> theirs<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
Blessed<S>3107</S> are ye<S>2075</S>, when<S>3752</S> men shall revile<S>3679</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> persecute<S>1377</S> you, and<S>2532</S> shall say<S>2036</S> all manner<S>3956</S> of evil<S>4190</S> <S>4487</S> against<S>2596</S> you<S>5216</S> falsely<S>5574</S>, for my sake<S>1752</S> <S>1700</S>. <sup>falsely: Gr. lying</sup>
Rejoice<S>5463</S>, and<S>2532</S> be exceeding glad<S>21</S>: for<S>3754</S> great<S>4183</S> is your<S>5216</S> reward<S>3408</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: for<S>1063</S> so<S>3779</S> persecuted they<S>1377</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> which<S>3588</S> were before<S>4253</S> you<S>5216</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> the salt<S>217</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>: but<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> the salt<S>217</S> have lost his savour<S>3471</S>, wherewith<S>1722</S> <S>5101</S> shall it be salted<S>233</S>? it is thenceforth<S>2089</S> good<S>2480</S> for<S>1519</S> nothing<S>3762</S>, but<S>1508</S> to be cast<S>906</S> out<S>1854</S>, and<S>2532</S> to be trodden under foot<S>2662</S> of<S>5259</S> men<S>444</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> the light<S>5457</S> of the world<S>2889</S>. A city<S>4172</S> that is set<S>2749</S> on<S>1883</S> an hill<S>3735</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> be hid<S>2928</S>.
Neither<S>3761</S> do men light<S>2545</S> a candle<S>3088</S>, and<S>2532</S> put<S>5087</S> it<S>846</S> under<S>5259</S> a bushel<S>3426</S>, but<S>235</S> on<S>1909</S> a candlestick<S>3087</S>; and<S>2532</S> it giveth light<S>2989</S> unto all<S>3956</S> that are in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3614</S>. <sup>a bushel: the word in the original signifieth a measure containing about a pint less than a peck</sup>
Let your<S>5216</S> light<S>5457</S> so<S>3779</S> shine<S>2989</S> before<S>1715</S> men<S>444</S>, that<S>3704</S> they may see<S>1492</S> your<S>5216</S> good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S>, and<S>2532</S> glorify<S>1392</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Think<S>3543</S> not<S>3361</S> that<S>3754</S> I am come<S>2064</S> to destroy<S>2647</S> the law<S>3551</S>, or<S>2228</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>: I am<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S> to destroy<S>2647</S>, but<S>235</S> to fulfil<S>4137</S>.
For<S>1063</S> verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> heaven<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> earth<S>1093</S> pass<S>3928</S>, one<S>1520</S> jot<S>2503</S> or<S>2228</S> one<S>3391</S> tittle<S>2762</S> shall in no wise<S>3364</S> pass<S>3928</S> from<S>575</S> the law<S>3551</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> all<S>3956</S> be fulfilled<S>1096</S>.
Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> therefore<S>3767</S> shall break<S>3089</S> one<S>3391</S> of these<S>5130</S> least<S>1646</S> commandments<S>1785</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall teach<S>1321</S> men<S>444</S> so<S>3779</S>, he shall be called<S>2564</S> the least<S>1646</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>: but<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall do<S>4160</S> and<S>2532</S> teach<S>1321</S> them, the same<S>3778</S> shall be called<S>2564</S> great<S>3173</S> in<S>1722</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> except<S>3362</S> your<S>5216</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> shall exceed<S>4052</S> <S>4119</S> the righteousness of the scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S>, ye shall in no case<S>3364</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of heaven<S>3772</S>.
Ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it was said<S>4483</S> by them of old time<S>744</S>, Thou shalt<S>5407</S> not<S>3756</S> kill<S>5407</S>; and<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall kill<S>5407</S> shall be<S>2071</S> in danger<S>1777</S> of the judgment<S>2920</S>: <sup>by: or, to</sup>
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> is angry<S>3710</S> with his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> without a cause<S>1500</S> shall be<S>2071</S> in danger<S>1777</S> of the judgment<S>2920</S>: and<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall say<S>2036</S> to his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>, Raca<S>4469</S>, shall be<S>2071</S> in danger<S>1777</S> of the council<S>4892</S>: but<S>1161</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall say<S>2036</S>, Thou fool<S>3474</S>, shall be<S>2071</S> in danger<S>1777</S> of<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S> fire<S>4442</S>. <sup>Raca: that is, Vain fellow</sup>
Therefore<S>3767</S> if<S>1437</S> thou bring<S>4374</S> thy<S>4675</S> gift<S>1435</S> to<S>1909</S> the altar<S>2379</S>, and there<S>2546</S> rememberest<S>3415</S> that<S>3754</S> thy<S>4675</S> brother<S>80</S> hath<S>2192</S> ought<S>5100</S> against<S>2596</S> thee<S>4675</S>;
Leave<S>863</S> there<S>1563</S> thy<S>4675</S> gift<S>1435</S> before<S>1715</S> the altar<S>2379</S>, and<S>2532</S> go thy way<S>5217</S>; first<S>4412</S> be reconciled<S>1259</S> to thy<S>4675</S> brother<S>80</S>, and<S>2532</S> then<S>5119</S> come<S>2064</S> and offer<S>4374</S> thy<S>4675</S> gift<S>1435</S>.
Agree<S>2468</S> <S>2132</S> with thine<S>4675</S> adversary<S>476</S> quickly<S>5035</S>, whiles<S>2193</S> <S>3755</S> thou art<S>1488</S> in<S>1722</S> the way<S>3598</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>; lest at any time<S>3379</S> the adversary<S>476</S> deliver<S>3860</S> thee<S>4571</S> to the judge<S>2923</S>, and<S>2532</S> the judge<S>2923</S> deliver<S>3860</S> thee<S>4571</S> to the officer<S>5257</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> prison<S>5438</S>.
Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>, Thou shalt<S>1831</S> by no means<S>3364</S> come<S>1831</S> out thence<S>1564</S>, till<S>2193</S> <S>302</S> thou hast paid<S>591</S> the uttermost<S>2078</S> farthing<S>2835</S>.
Ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it was said<S>4483</S> by them of old time<S>744</S>, Thou shalt<S>3431</S> not<S>3756</S> commit adultery<S>3431</S>:
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> whosoever<S>3956</S> looketh<S>991</S> on a woman<S>1135</S> to<S>4314</S> lust after<S>1937</S> her<S>846</S> hath committed adultery<S>3431</S> with her<S>846</S> already<S>2235</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>.
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> thy<S>4675</S> right<S>1188</S> eye<S>3788</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, pluck<S>1807</S> it<S>846</S> out<S>1807</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> it from<S>575</S> thee<S>4675</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is profitable<S>4851</S> for thee<S>4671</S> that<S>2443</S> one<S>1520</S> of thy<S>4675</S> members<S>3196</S> should perish<S>622</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> that thy<S>4675</S> whole<S>3650</S> body<S>4983</S> should be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S>. <sup>offend: or, do cause thee to offend</sup>
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1487</S> thy<S>4675</S> right<S>1188</S> hand<S>5495</S> offend<S>4624</S> thee<S>4571</S>, cut<S>1581</S> it<S>846</S> off<S>1581</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>906</S> it from<S>575</S> thee<S>4675</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is profitable<S>4851</S> for thee<S>4671</S> that<S>2443</S> one<S>1520</S> of thy<S>4675</S> members<S>3196</S> should perish<S>622</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> that thy<S>4675</S> whole<S>3650</S> body<S>4983</S> should be cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> hell<S>1067</S>.
<S>1161</S> It hath been said<S>4483</S> <S>3754</S>, Whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall put away<S>630</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, let him give<S>1325</S> her<S>846</S> a writing of divorcement<S>647</S>:
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall put away<S>630</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S>, saving<S>3924</S> for the cause<S>3056</S> of fornication<S>4202</S>, causeth<S>4160</S> her<S>846</S> to commit adultery<S>3429</S>: and<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> shall marry<S>1060</S> her that is divorced<S>630</S> committeth adultery<S>3429</S>.
Again<S>3825</S>, ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it hath been said<S>4483</S> by them of old time<S>744</S>, Thou shalt<S>1964</S> not<S>3756</S> forswear thyself<S>1964</S>, but<S>1161</S> shalt perform<S>591</S> unto the Lord<S>2962</S> thine<S>4675</S> oaths<S>3727</S>:
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Swear<S>3660</S> not<S>3361</S> at all<S>3654</S>; neither<S>3383</S> by<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>; for<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> God's<S>2316</S> throne<S>2362</S>:
Nor<S>3383</S> by<S>1722</S> the earth<S>1093</S>; for<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> his<S>846</S> footstool<S>4228</S> <S>5286</S>: neither<S>3383</S> by<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>; for<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> the city<S>4172</S> of the great<S>3173</S> King<S>935</S>.
Neither<S>3383</S> shalt thou swear<S>3660</S> by<S>1722</S> thy<S>4675</S> head<S>2776</S>, because<S>3754</S> thou canst<S>1410</S> not<S>3756</S> make<S>4160</S> one<S>3391</S> hair<S>2359</S> white<S>3022</S> or<S>2228</S> black<S>3189</S>.
But<S>1161</S> let<S>2077</S> your<S>5216</S> communication<S>3056</S> be<S>2077</S>, Yea<S>3483</S>, yea<S>3483</S>; Nay<S>3756</S>, nay<S>3756</S>: for<S>1161</S> whatsoever is more<S>4053</S> than these<S>5130</S> cometh<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> evil<S>4190</S>.
Ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it hath been said<S>4483</S>, An eye<S>3788</S> for<S>473</S> an eye<S>3788</S>, and<S>2532</S> a tooth<S>3599</S> for<S>473</S> a tooth<S>3599</S>:
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That ye resist<S>436</S> not<S>3361</S> evil<S>4190</S>: but<S>235</S> whosoever<S>3748</S> shall smite<S>4474</S> thee<S>4571</S> on<S>1909</S> thy<S>4675</S> right<S>1188</S> cheek<S>4600</S>, turn<S>4762</S> to him<S>846</S> the other<S>243</S> also<S>2532</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if any man will<S>2309</S> sue<S>2919</S> thee<S>4671</S> at the law<S>2919</S>, and<S>2532</S> take away<S>2983</S> thy<S>4675</S> coat<S>5509</S>, let<S>863</S> him<S>846</S> have<S>863</S> thy cloke<S>2440</S> also<S>2532</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whosoever<S>3748</S> shall compel<S>29</S> thee<S>4571</S> to go<S>29</S> a<S>1520</S> mile<S>3400</S>, go<S>5217</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S> twain<S>1417</S>.
Give<S>1325</S> to him that asketh<S>154</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> from him that would<S>2309</S> borrow<S>1155</S> of<S>575</S> thee<S>4675</S> turn<S>654</S> not<S>3361</S> thou away<S>654</S>.
Ye have heard<S>191</S> that<S>3754</S> it hath been said<S>4483</S>, Thou shalt love<S>25</S> thy<S>4675</S> neighbour<S>4139</S>, and<S>2532</S> hate<S>3404</S> thine<S>4675</S> enemy<S>2190</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Love<S>25</S> your<S>5216</S> enemies<S>2190</S>, bless<S>2127</S> them that curse<S>2672</S> you<S>5209</S>, do<S>4160</S> good<S>2573</S> to them that hate<S>3404</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> pray<S>4336</S> for<S>5228</S> them which<S>3588</S> despitefully use<S>1908</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> persecute<S>1377</S> you<S>5209</S>;
That<S>3704</S> ye may be<S>1096</S> the children<S>5207</S> of your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>: for<S>3754</S> he maketh<S>393</S> his<S>846</S> sun<S>2246</S> to rise<S>393</S> on<S>1909</S> the evil<S>4190</S> and<S>2532</S> on the good<S>18</S>, and<S>2532</S> sendeth rain<S>1026</S> on<S>1909</S> the just<S>1342</S> and<S>2532</S> on the unjust<S>94</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1437</S> ye love<S>25</S> them which<S>3588</S> love<S>25</S> you<S>5209</S>, what<S>5101</S> reward<S>3408</S> have ye<S>2192</S>? do<S>4160</S> not<S>3780</S> even<S>2532</S> the publicans<S>5057</S> the same<S>846</S>?
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> ye salute<S>782</S> your<S>5216</S> brethren<S>80</S> only<S>3440</S>, what<S>5101</S> do<S>4160</S> ye more<S>4053</S> than others? do<S>4160</S> not<S>3780</S> even<S>2532</S> the publicans<S>5057</S> so<S>3779</S>?
Be<S>2071</S> ye<S>5210</S> therefore<S>3767</S> perfect<S>5046</S>, even<S>5618</S> as your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> is<S>2076</S> perfect<S>5046</S>.
